title: Forced to Patch AFTER Champion Selection - Ranked!
body:
So I've left my client on since the patch 3.12 and played about ten or so matches over the course of October 2nd without being forced to further patch or restart the client until just about 15 minutes ago I was disconnected AFTER champion selection in a ranked match and forced to patch as the match started.

I've already sent in a support ticket regarding this, but considering how slow the connection is where I currently am, the 700MB patch will likely take longer than the match will; isn't this viable grounds for the loss to be forgiven for my teammates and myself and having the leave expunged from my record?

replies.body: Happened to me as well but my client completely bugged out and needed to re-install. bogus
I'm having the same thing occur to me as I type this. Champ select ended, but the game wouldn't load, instead it started patching. This problem's been around for months, Riot needs to address it.
Loss forgiven is weird. I doubt you would actually receive one, even if this is the case, as they are pretty strict with it. My condolences, and I hope you get lucky on getting that loss forgiven.

Holy crapzilla yeah, that would suck for everyone. 
Especially bad since you almost certainly got a whole bunch of reports on that one!

Good luck on your support ticket!
